Docs.summary: This class implements checking what processes are locking a file on Windows. It uses the Restart Manager API to do this. Other platforms are skipped. Use the method to get a message to inform the user which processes have a lock on a given file.

Docs.summary: Try to get a message to inform the user which processes have a lock on a given file. On Windows it uses the Restart Manager API.
